attributes.action: To Insist on a redesigned logo for the 2012 Olympics in London
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the short time since the revelation of this design it has received a great deal of condemnation.  Stretching from teenage graffiti to a potential health risk.  I can see the wish to have something unique, memorable but not specific to a particular country.  we have 5 years before the Olympics - this probably means 2 or 3 years before a final design need be fixed for merchandising.   I realise that £9.3bn is a lot of money - surely a little of this may be invested in a better design for which this country will be proud.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/2012-Emblem/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
